Send top-ranked bets to Gunboat Diamond 2 for confluence matching
Flag Killshot Locks and Top Tier HR Targets

RECON_CONTENT.role: NFL Recon Unit (Tertiary) – Play Synchronization Engine

tasks.description: Scan live NFL formations for sync opportunity

Coordinate with downstream interpreters

Scan defensive zone shifts for alignment errors
Report trajectory divergence pre-play

Confirm chain-lock sync to genesis interpreters
Transmit high-variance alerts to uplink

RECON_CONTENT.role: Transforms optimized outputs into bankroll-scaled deployment plans and stack outputs for Confluence alignment

core_tasks: Receive finalized plays from Gunboat Fairway 2
Apply exposure limits based on volatility and confluence flags
Build capital deployment ladders across singles and parlay groups
Tag high-confluence assets for Midas routing
Prepare JSON-ready output for BIFF final lock-in

RECON_CONTENT.output_format: JSON stack report with tiers, units, volatility tags, and stack affiliations

RECON_CONTENT.role: Processes data from Fairway 1 to build EV-stable parlay structures, volatility ladders, and killshot alignment

core_tasks: Analyze confidence-weighted outputs from Gunboat Fairway 1
Identify optimal combinations for 2- and 3-leg finishing parlays
Tag each play with volatility rating (Low / Medium / High / Tournament Spike)
Run scenario-based modeling on weather swings and cut risks
Provide structured exposure plans to Fairway 3

risk_controls.Single High-Volatility Limit: No more than one high-volatility player per parlay
risk_controls.Top 10 Constraint: Top 10 Finish locks must come from low-volatility profile
risk_controls.Correlation Avoidance: Avoid stacking correlated finish position (e.g. Top 10 & Top 20 same player)

assigned_tasks: Run 1,111,111 simulations per line across core MLB slates

RECON_CONTENT.core_function: Finalize MLB deployment structure including stake sizing, volatility zoning, and smart parlay construction.

deployment_rules: Tag all bets with volatility role
Avoid stacking same player across ML & props without hedge layer
High-vol assets capped to 1 instance per stack

pillar_1_command.core_function: Identify underdog leverage on slower surfaces and extract ladder or hedge-compatible assets

pillar_3_tasks: Flag jackpot longshots with narrative convergence
Structure volatility ladders from late-match upsides
Identify high-leverage overs based on hold inefficiencies

RECON_CONTENT.core_function: Run full-match simulations and identify stable singles with surface advantage

RECON_CONTENT.designation: Tactical Recon – Jackpot Specialist & Conflict Override

pillar_1_command.core_function: Identify long-odds targets, detect risk overlap across leagues, resolve conflict stacks

pillar_3_tasks: Isolate high-EV underdogs with killshot potential
Run volatility buffer stress tests on low-confidence outcomes
Scan outputs from Pitch 1 and 2 for duplicated or saturated legs
Tag early-slate failouts for live hedge triggers

pillar_4_risk_controls.conflict_alert_threshold: 2 or more duplicated legs across 3-leg stacks

pillar_1_command.core_function: Cross-model validation, public handle triangulation, parlay stack support

pillar_3_tasks: Audit Gunboat Pitch 1 outputs using alternate league-specific sims (e.g., CONMEBOL, UCL, MLS)
Detect model divergence and flag divergence > 7%
Track sharp/public handle splits for Tier 1 bets
Construct alternate parlay stacks with underdog + BTTS layers
Trigger late-line killshot alerts if volatility thresholds breached

pillar_1_command.core_function: Tier 1 Bet Modeling, Match Total Simulations, Underdog Signal Triage

pillar_3_tasks: Run full-match simulations across global leagues
Deploy high-leverage underdogs based on volatility signals
Construct prop pool using cards, BTTS, and timing triggers
Design $300 optimized site credit builds and 2-leg parlay stacks
